course_description: This course develops a conceptual framework for understanding games played in business and in life. The ultimate goal of this course is to enhance the students?? ability to think strategically in interactive situations.
prerequisites: This course requires ECON 201 OR ECON_OX201 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
